pr_title: bugfix: the disposables tree set won't accept another Disposable with the same priority.

timeline.message:
bugfix: the disposables tree set won't accept another Disposable with
the same priority.

Disposable TmNettyRemotingClient and RmNettyRemotingClient added by
GlobalTransactionScanner have the same priority by default, so the
RmNettyRemotingClient won't be closed gracefully during shutdown.

timeline.bodyText: use PriorityQueue to replace TreeSet will solve this problem once and forever. No need to add a "seqId" to fix the probem which is actually caused by TreeSet.
timeline.author: selfishlover
